doc.field: Labor relations, law, education papers, pamphlets, clippings, notes, publications. Socialist Party pamphlet (1930). Radio program transcript on atom bomb. WWH Army correspondence and papers from Italian training institute (1945). Political writing by Manson (1948). National Conference for Clarifying the Constitution by Amendment Symposium paper (1937). Rand School of Social Science brochures. Personal correspondence and writings. Biographical materials. Papers re: Frank Schechter Estate. National Committee for Rural Schools correspondence. Passover and other religious booklets. American Veterans Committee paper. Non-print items: Marquee poster for Independent Labor Conference for G.I.s (c. 1948).
